p: The LiAlH 4-LiNH 2 composites have also been studied [ 108, 109, 110, 111, 112, 113]. The first dehydrogenation steps are the decomposition of LiAlH 4 to Al and LiH. Then its dehydrogenation products react with LiNH 2.
